definition: (of speech or actions) direct and efficient/without fooling around
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: He has an incisive manner of speaking, happily free from umms and ers.
sentences.chinese: 他說話乾脆利落，完全沒有哼哼哈哈的腔調。

sentences.english: I struck the ball cleanly and my shot was on target.
sentences.chinese: 我乾脆利落地擊球，命中了目標。

sentences.english: It has a crisp visual impact.
sentences.chinese: 它是一個乾脆利落的視覺衝擊。

sentences.english: Her voice was crisp and authoritative.
sentences.chinese: 她的聲音乾脆利落，具有權威性。

definition: cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
to cut weeds and eliminate the roots (idiom); to destroy root and branch/to eliminate completely
to have a fluent command of (idiom)
to convert an enemy into a friend (idiom)
rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
